ESTABLISHED IN 2007

BARRIE SEO

We offer a full range of in-house SEO marketing services.

SCHEDULE A PHONE CALL TODAY

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1537197760045{background-color: #c49f43 !important;}”][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1576790478298{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 8% !important;background-color: #ff9d00 !important;}” el_id=”clientRow2″][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23936″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23707″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23706″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23705″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23704″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23806″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23944″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23701″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23804″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23939″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/12″][vc_single_image image=”23940″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1537301088839{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1542226848315{padding-top: 16% !important;}”]

KING OF BARRIE SEO

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Chris A. Hughes a.k.a. The King Of Barrie Search Engine Optimization is a Canadian born business magnate, world-renowned online digital marketer and entrepreneur extraordinaire.

In the early 2000s, Chris led the expansion of the organic marketing industry and continues to be seen as one of the world’s foremost expert in Barrie SEO, branding and website development today.

During his time developing the internet-marketing industry, Chris accrued substantial profits from his internet & technology businesses. By age 27, Chris became a self-made millionaire selling t-shirts online.

Today, Chris is the founder of A Nerd’s World – a global web development company with over 4000 websites built for local and international clients in over 50+ countries. Together, Chris and his team of SEO nerds have helped hundreds of businesses both big and small rank #1 on Google.

Chris is seen by many as a thought-leader in the Search Engine Optimization in Barrie. His YouTube channel is one of the top channels in the Canadian entrepreneur category with 200+ videos and more than 2 million total views. Chris has a following of 100,000+ fans across his social media pages – growing by hundreds every day – and has been featured in 23 newspapers, 6 magazines and 12 podcasts.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_btn title=”REQUEST A FREE BARRIE SEO CONSULTATION” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”inverse” align=”left” el_class=”butonThis” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Ftoronto-seo-nerds|||”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1537301100255{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #f3f3f3 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

BARRIE SEO SERVICES

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

A Nerd’s World is led by an experienced managing team of Barrie SEO veterans that founded the company on the principle of providing honest and outstanding online search engine optimization.  We guarantee that our Barrie SEO strategies will deliver real results for our clients.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”18px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”24170″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

ON-PAGE
SEO
JUMPSTART

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

On-page SEO is the practice of optimizing individual web pages in order to rank higher and earn more relevant traffic on Bing and Google.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”8px”][vc_btn title=”BARRIE SEO CONTACT US” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”inverse” align=”center” el_class=”butonThis” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Ftoronto-seo-nerds|||”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”24166″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

MONTHLY
SEO
PLANS

Expertly targeted, daily managed SEO strategies guarantee maximum exposure for your website.  Our plans start at $1000 per month, with no contracts.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”8px”][vc_btn title=”BARRIE SEO CONTACT US” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”inverse” align=”center” el_class=”butonThis” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Ftoronto-seo-nerds|||”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”24168″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_column_text]

EXPERT
SEO
CONSULTING

This one-on-one training will teach you how to build a Search Engine Optimization strategy for your business.  First page Google rankings are only 60-90 days away!

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”8px”][vc_btn title=”BARRIE SEO CONTACT US” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”inverse” align=”center” el_class=”butonThis” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Ftoronto-seo-nerds|||”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1537370540637{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

100% GUARANTEED SEO RESULTS

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”23910″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center” el_class=”dimend”][vc_column_text]

Following the initial kick-off meeting, we will outline your goals, create milestones, brainstorm new ideas and set priorities for your Search Engine Optimization Strategy. Now we have a strategic plan in place that aligns with your initial vision and makes your website goals achievable.  Our SEO team will bring you results that stick. With our complete & guaranteed customized SEO solutions, you won’t have to worry about hiring another SEO company again. We understand how important it is to keep our clients both updated & satisfied!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” disable_element=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1537284162359{padding-top: 120px !important;padding-bottom: 120px !important;background: #ffffff url(https://anerdsworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/40.jpg?id=23923) !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”videoCen”][video_lightbox_youtube video_id=v24tT_lfVrM width=640 height=480 anchor=”https://anerdsworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/play.png”]

REAL NERDS. REAL EXPERIENCE. REAL PASSION

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1537284931247{margin-bottom: -15px !important;background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text el_class=”videoCen”][rev_slider alias=”september-19-seo”][/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1537289847977{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #f3f3f3 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

TRUSTED BARRIE SEO EXPERTS

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Meet the Barrie SEO agency that brings you website traffic and leads instead of excuses.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”23761″ alignment=”center” el_class=”circleP”][vc_column_text]

CHRIS

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

“Today it’s not simply about ‘get the traffic’ – it’s about ‘get the targeted and relevant website traffic.”

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”23762″ alignment=”center” el_class=”circleP”][vc_column_text]

CHARLIE

“Building a website without Search Engine Optimization is like building a street without signs or directions.”

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”23763″ alignment=”center” el_class=”circleP”][vc_column_text]

MARK

“We’ve got to create a unique, special experience for them and delight visitors in addition to satisfying their SEO query.”

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”23764″ alignment=”center” el_class=”circleP”][vc_column_text]

MING

“Successful SEO is not about tricking Google. It’s about partnering with them to prove you’re the best.”

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1537453930568{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-image: url(https://anerdsworld.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/seo-toronto-stats.jpg?id=24032) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

SEO HELPS PUT MORE EYES ON YOUR WEBSITE, AND THAT MEANS MORE TRAFFIC, LEADS, CLIENTS AND SALES

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

In today’s hyperconnected world and highly competitive business environment, it’s crucial for a business to be able to reach its target audience online with its core message, products and services or latest promotions.

This is where Barrie Search Engine Optimization (SEO) comes in. If done right, and in combination with other online marketing and technical strategies, SEO can help your business get great rankings and land on the front page of Google’s search. The first page of Google receives 95% of all website traffic, while only 5% of users make it to the second page.  You really need your business or organization to rank as high as possible on search engines to reach your full potential online.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”7px”][vc_btn title=”REQUEST YOUR FREE SEO CONSULTATION” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”white” align=”left” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Ftoronto-seo-nerds|||”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1537292382897{padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #f3f3f3 !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

READY FOR BETTER SEO? HERE’S WHAT HAPPENS NEXT

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Your Barrie SEO agency needs a proven framework to deliver more traffic, and increase in customers & leads, and sales.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1537292357595{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”24152″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537291699270{padding-bottom: 5px !important;}”]

CONTACT

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

We’re excited! Once you contact us, our Search Engine Optimization team will triangulate the signal as quickly as humanly possible, then reach out to schedule our first call or in-person meeting.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”24150″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537291709080{padding-bottom: 5px !important;}”]

DISCOVERY

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

We’ll have a friendly conversation full of good questions so we can get to know your business objectives and your dreams of SEO glory. We will also review your 3 biggest competitors.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”24153″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537391118052{padding-bottom: 5px !important;}”]

KEYWORDS

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Next step, keyword research and analysis phase. Our team of Toronto SEO specialists will dive deep—way deep—to gather all the statistics required to create a customized report.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”24155″ alignment=”center”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537291726788{padding-bottom: 5px !important;}”]

STRATEGY

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Finally, we develop a custom SEO strategy for your specific business needs, including a detailed timeline, list of deliverables, and all the fancy ways we’ll measure progress along the way.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_btn title=”YES, I WANT CHRIS TO TEACH ME HOW TO GROW MY BUSINESS WITH SEARCH ENGINE OPTIMIZATION” style=”outline” shape=”square” color=”inverse” align=”center” el_class=”butonThis” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fanerdsworld.com%2Ftoronto-seo-nerds|||”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1537064914067{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1542227197730{margin-bottom: 10px !important;}”]

OUR BARRIE SEO CLIENTS LOVE WORKING WITH US

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537282006094{padding-top: 10px !important;}”]

We can’t stress it enough— we place unparalleled value on building long-term relationships, providing superb customer service and developing high-quality search engine optimization strategies for our clients. Our SEO results speak volumes to our capablities and our clients love us!

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1537064921090{background-color: #ffffff !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1536252284883{padding-right: 20px !important;}” el_class=”animated slideInUp duration2 nospace”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”23770″ alignment=”center” el_class=”borderC”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_empty_space height=”3px”][vc_column_text el_class=”nameAndP”]JERRY SIMON
Real Estate Agent[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537280927981{margin-top: -10px !important;}”]

“Not all search engine optimization companies are the same! I say this because we’ve been through about 3 others and none provided the same level of service and communications as Chris and his team of nerds. If you’re willing to invest in an agency that actually delivers, this should be your go-to company.   They understand the importance of ROI, and always get results.

Phenomenal support since day one from this company. How could anyone not be satisfied with in depth, statistical reports every month, from an SEO company that actually cares. I’ve dealt with a lot of frauds so it is very relieving to have come across these nerds.
Thanks SEO Nerds!”

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”sig”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”23836″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1536252280219{padding-right: 20px !important;}” el_class=”animated slideInUp duration4 nospace”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”23775″ alignment=”center” el_class=”borderC”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_empty_space height=”3px”][vc_column_text el_class=”nameAndP”]CHERYL BERNARD
Early Childhood Education[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537280934691{margin-top: -10px !important;}”]

“If I could give ANW 6 stars I would! I have been very impressed with the results I am getting for my Organic searches. They have taken some of my key word searches from #24 to ranking #2 and have gotten me better results than all of my previous efforts and hard spent money.

Chris has been great. He always follows through with what he says he’s going to do and is always available for my questions and concerns on the phone or in-person.

I would definitely recommend A Nerd’s World for SEO to any business, except for one that is competing with me.”[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”6px”][vc_row_inner el_class=”sig”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”23837″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1536252275187{padding-right: 20px !important;}” el_class=”animated slideInUp duration6 nospace”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/4″][vc_single_image image=”23778″ alignment=”center” el_class=”borderC”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][vc_empty_space height=”3px”][vc_column_text el_class=”nameAndP”]BLAKE SHANNON
E-Commerce Business[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1537280942078{margin-top: -10px !important;}”]

“I could not be any happier with nerd’s world and their SEO team.

A few months ago I started a small business. As with most new businesses my Google ranking was next to nothing. I knew I needed help with my positioning on Google and decided to give nerd’s world a try for my SEO.  Boy am I glad I did!

Chris and his SEO team were extremely patient and pleasant to work with. They explained the entire process and they were easily reachable when I had questions. I began noticing higher rankings within 30-60 days and many of my keywords made it to the first page of Google.

Hiring them for SEO is one of the best decisions I’ve ever made for my new business. I can not recommend them enough! Thanks so much!”[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”sig”][vc_column_inner width=”7/12″][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”5/12″][vc_single_image image=”23835″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
